content.raw:
Hi Malcolm,

I updated the [ExampleSetup](#!/osrf/subt/wiki/tutorials/ExampleSetup) tutorial page, can you check the following in your local catkin install?

`Make sure that the teleop.launch file has the "config" arg set to logitech_config.yaml`

`Then confirm that the controller is sending heading commands by opening another terminal (make sure you source the setup files) and run one of the commands below. You should see non-zero values when moving the stick.`

`rostopic echo /X1/cmd_vel`

or

`ign topic -e -t /model/X1/cmd_vel_relay`
content.html:
Hi Malcolm,

I updated the ExampleSetup tutorial page, can you check the following in your local catkin install?

Make sure that the teleop.launch file has the "config" arg set to logitech_config.yaml

Then confirm that the controller is sending heading commands by opening another terminal (make sure you source the setup files) and run one of the commands below. You should see non-zero values when moving the stick.

rostopic echo /X1/cmd_vel

or

ign topic -e -t /model/X1/cmd_vel_relay
